<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<?import javafx.scene.chart.PieChart?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.Button?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.Label?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?>
<?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>

<AnchorPane prefHeight="750.0" prefWidth="850.0" styleClass="root" stylesheets="@../../Styles/profile.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.smartfinance.Controller.Client.profileController">
   <children>
       <AnchorPane layoutX="10.0" layoutY="10.0" prefHeight="730.0" prefWidth="830.0" styleClass="inner_container" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="10.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="10.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="10.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="10.0">
           <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" styleClass="title" text="User Profile" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="20.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="20.0" />
           <Label layoutX="20.0" layoutY="75.0" text="View and manage your profile information." AnchorPane.leftAnchor="20.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="75.0" />

           <VBox layoutX="58.0" layoutY="140.0" prefHeight="154.0" prefWidth="300.0" spacing="15.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="58.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="120.0">
              <children>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
                          <Label prefWidth="120.0" text="First Name:" />
                          <Label fx:id="first_name_lbl" text="N/A" />
                      </children>
                  </HBox>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
                          <Label prefWidth="120.0" text="Last Name:" />
                          <Label fx:id="last_name_lbl" text="N/A" />
                      </children>
                  </HBox>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
                          <Label prefWidth="120.0" text="Payee Address:" />
                          <Label fx:id="payee_address_lbl" text="N/A" />
                      </children>
                  </HBox>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
                          <Label prefWidth="120.0" text="Registration Date:" />
                          <Label fx:id="reg_date_lbl" text="N/A" />
                      </children>
                  </HBox>
              </children>
           </VBox>

           <VBox layoutX="450.0" layoutY="160.0" prefHeight="154.0" prefWidth="300.0" spacing="15.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="70.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="120.0">
              <children>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
                          <Label prefWidth="150.0" text="Wallet Account Number:" />
                          <Label fx:id="wallet_acc_num_lbl" text="N/A" />
                      </children>
                  </HBox>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
                          <Label prefWidth="150.0" text="Wallet Balance:" />
                          <Label fx:id="wallet_balance_lbl" text="N/A" />
                      </children>
                  </HBox>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
                          <Label prefWidth="150.0" text="Savings Account Number:" />
                          <Label fx:id="savings_acc_num_lbl" text="N/A" />
                      </children>
                  </HBox>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
                          <Label prefWidth="150.0" text="Savings Balance:" />
                          <Label fx:id="savings_balance_lbl" text="N/A" />
                      </children>
                  </HBox>
              </children>
           </VBox>

           <Button fx:id="refresh_btn" layoutX="56.0" layoutY="294.0" prefHeight="30.0" prefWidth="100.0" text="Refresh" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="56.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="294.0" />

           <PieChart fx:id="expenditure_pie_chart" layoutX="35.0" layoutY="375.0" prefHeight="280.0" prefWidth="757.0" title="Expenditures by Category" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="10.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="20.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="20.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="350.0" />
       </AnchorPane>
   </children>
</AnchorPane>

autoAppliedRules.name: User AI Instruction
autoAppliedRules.content:
✅ Full Tech Stack for Your Smart Personal Finance & Investment Manager
Area	Technologies	Purpose
Core Language	Java 17+	Main development
UI	JavaFX	Desktop GUI
Data Storage	SQLite (local), MySQL/PostgreSQL (cloud/web)	Persist transactions, user data
Build Tool	Maven or Gradle	Dependency management
Charting	JavaFX Charts or JFreeChart	Dashboard visualization
API Calls	Java HttpClient, Retrofit (optional)	Fetch stock/ETF data
Machine Learning	Weka or custom Java logic	Risk profile analyzer
PDF/CSV Export	Apache PDFBox / iText (PDF), OpenCSV	Financial report export
Authentication	Custom login system (hashed passwords, Java Crypto), or Firebase/Auth0 (web version)	Secure login
Notifications	JavaFX Alert, desktop notifications (java.awt.SystemTray)	Budget/investment alerts
Scheduling	ScheduledExecutorService, Quartz Scheduler	Auto data refresh, alerts
Optional Web Version	Spring Boot + Thymeleaf (or REST + React)	If you want to turn this into a web app later

✅ Mapping Features to Technologies
 1. User Authentication
Feature	Tools
Secure login/signup	JavaFX form + hashed passwords (e.g., SHA-256 with salt)
Session management	Store current user ID/session info in memory or DB

 2. Add/Edit/Delete Transactions
Feature	Tools
Form UI	JavaFX
Storage	SQLite / MySQL
Date input	JavaFX DatePicker

 3. Categorize Transactions
Feature	Tools
Manual	Dropdown in JavaFX
Auto	Keyword mapping logic in Java

 4. Dashboard with Charts
Feature	Tools
Monthly Spending / Income vs Expenses	JavaFX LineChart / BarChart / PieChart
Savings Growth	LineChart with time series data

 5. Budget Setup & Alerts
Feature	Tools
Budget input	JavaFX input fields
Alerts	JavaFX Alert or tray popup using SystemTray
Auto-check	ScheduledExecutorService to compare actual vs. budget regularly

 6. Recurring Expense Handling
Feature	Tools
Pattern recognition	Java logic: group transactions by name/date interval
Auto-categorization	Identify frequency (e.g., same vendor every 30 days)

 7. Export to CSV / PDF
Feature	Tools
CSV	OpenCSV
PDF	iText or Apache PDFBox

 Investment Features
 1. AI-Based Risk Profile Analyzer
Feature	Tools
Risk quiz	JavaFX form
Analysis	Java logic or Weka ML model
Result categories	Conservative, Moderate, Aggressive

 Store results for future recommendations.

 2. Safe Stocks & ETF Recommender
Feature	Tools
Data	Finnhub API / Alpha Vantage
Fetching	Java HttpClient, JSON parsing
Logic	Filter by market cap, beta, volume, dividend
UI	ListView or CardView in JavaFX showing suggestions with short descriptions

 3. Auto-Invest Planner
Feature	Tools
Surplus calculation	Total Income - Total Expense
Suggestions	Rule-based logic based on risk profile
UI	Monthly suggestion popups or sidebar panel

 4. "Learn While You Invest"
Feature	Tools
Tips data	JSON file or embedded DB table
Display	Tooltips in JavaFX, or context-aware popups

 5. Smart Alerts for Investment Opportunities
Feature	Tools
Polling	ScheduledExecutorService fetches API data
Conditions	e.g., "Stock X dropped 5%"
Alerts	JavaFX or SystemTray popup
Storage	Save alert history in SQLite

 Folder Structure Example
pgsql
Copy
Edit
com.smartfinance
├── Main.java
├── auth
│   ├── LoginController.java
│   └── RegisterController.java
├── dashboard
│   ├── DashboardController.java
│   └── ChartUtils.java
├── model
│   ├── User.java
│   ├── Transaction.java
│   └── RiskProfile.java
├── service
│   ├── TransactionService.java
│   ├── InvestmentService.java
│   ├── RiskAnalyzer.java
│   └── APIClient.java
├── util
│   ├── DatabaseHelper.java
│   ├── CSVExporter.java
│   └── PDFGenerator.java
├── view
│   ├── login.fxml
│   ├── dashboard.fxml
│   └── charts.fxml
└── resources
    ├── tips.json
    └── application.properties
 Suggested Roadmap to Build
Phase 1: Core Personal Finance
 User Auth (Login/Register)

 Add/Edit/Delete Transactions

 Categorize & Store Transactions

 Dashboard Charts

 Budget Setup & Alerts

Phase 2: Advanced Automation
 Recurring Expense Detection

 Export to PDF/CSV

 Notifications via tray or in-app

Phase 3: Investment Module
 Risk Profiler

 Safe Stock Recommender

 Auto-Invest Planner

 Investment Education Tips

 Real-time Alerts

 Tools & Libraries Summary
Area	Tool
UI	JavaFX
Charts	JavaFX, JFreeChart
Data Storage	SQLite, H2 (dev), MySQL (prod)
API	Finnhub, Alpha Vantage
JSON	org.json, Jackson, or Gson
Scheduling	ScheduledExecutorService
CSV	OpenCSV
PDF	iText, Apache PDFBox
ML	Weka (risk analysis)
Authentication	Java MessageDigest or bcrypt (JBCrypt)
Logging	SLF4J + Logback (make sure that these features are perfectly working)

questions.question: Would you like me to draft the recommended `.zencoder/rules/repo.md` file content summarizing the project structure and key technologies, so you can review or add it to the repo?
options: No, just outline what should go inside

content.text:
Java 17+ modules.

## Tech Stack
- **Language**: Java 17 (module path)
- **UI**: JavaFX (`javafx-controls`, `javafx-fxml`, `javafx-graphics`)
- **Dependency Management**: Maven
- **Database**: SQLite ` viasqlite-jdbc`
- **CSV Export**: `openc`
sv- **JSON Handling**: `org.json`
- **Icons & UI Enhancements**: FontAwesomeFX, FormsFX
- **HTTP & Scheduling:** Java `ClientHttp`, `ScheduledServiceExecutor`
- **Testing**: JUnit Jupiter 5.10.2

## Build & Run
1. **Prerequisites**
   - Install JDK 17 or newer.
   - Ensure JavaFX 24 compatibility (already managed via Maven dependencies).
2. **Compile**
   - `mvn clean compile`
3. **Run**
   - `mvn clean javafx:run`
     - Entry point specified in `pom.xml`: `com.smartfinance/com.smartfinance.App`.
4. **Packaging**
   Custom packaging - not defined yet; use `mvn package` for basic JAR.

## Module Configuration
- **module-info.java** exports:
  - `com.smartfinance`
  - `com.smartfinance.Controller`
  - `com.smartfinance.Controller.Admin`
  - `com.smartfinance.Controller.Client`
  - `com.smartfinance.Models`
  - `com.smartfinance.Views`
- Opens corresponding packages to `javafx.fxml` for controller injection.

## Key Directories & Files
- **src/main/java/com/smartfinance/App.java**: JavaFX Application launcher.
 **-Controllers**
  - `.smartcom.Controllerfinance` (shared)
  - `com.smartfinance.Controller.Admin`
  - `com.smartfinance.Controller.Client`
- **Models**
  - `Account`, `Admin`, `Client`, `Investment`, `RiskProfile`, `Transaction`, `WalletAccount`, `SavingsAccount`, `DatabaseDriver`.
- **Views**
  - `ViewFactory`, `ClientCellFactory`, `TransactionCellFactory`, enums for menu options and account types.
- **Services**
  - `InvestmentService`, `APIClient` (HTTP integrations).
- **Resources**
  - `src/main/resources/Fxml` (FXML layouts such as `Client/profile.fxml`)
  - `src/main/resources/Styles` (CSS, e.g., `profile.css`)
- **Tests**
  - Located under `/tests` (standalone Java files and batch scripts).

## Styling & Assets
- **CSS**: Styles located in `src/main/resources/Styles`.
- **FXML**: Ensurefx `:controller` classes align with modules exported in `module-info.java`.

## Database Notes
- **SQLite**:
  - Connection handled via `DatabaseDriver`.
  - Ensure the database file path is configured within model/service classes before runtime##.

 Testing
- **JUnit Jupiter**:
  - Execute with `mvn test`.
  - Some test utilities include batch scripts under `/tests`.

## Common Tasks
1. **Add new FXML screen**
   - Place layout in `src/main/resources/Fxml/...`
   - Create corresponding controller under `src/main/java/com/smartfinance/Controller/...`
   - Register via `ViewFactory` if navigation needed.
2. **Database migrations**
   - Update `DatabaseDriver` and related DAO/service classes.
3. **Stylesheet updates**
   - Modify CSS in `Styles` directory and ensure components reference them via `stylesheets` attribute.

## Pending Enhancements (High-Level)
- Budget alerts via `ScheduledExecutorService`.
- Risk profiling logic using Weka or ML custom.
- Investment recommendation integration with external APIs (Finnhub, Alpha Vantage).
- PDF export supportconsider ( `PDFBox` or `iText`).
```

**Next Steps**
1. Create the file if desired: ensure the `.zencoder/rules` directory exists (it does).
2. Paste the draft content into `repo.md`.
3. Adjust any project-specific nuances you want recorded (e.g., environment configs, known issues).

Let me know if you’d like me to add this file directly or tailor any sections further!

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<?import javafx.scene.chart.PieChart?>

<?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?>

<?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?>
<?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>

<AnchorPane prefHeight="750.0" prefWidth="850.0" styleClass="root" stylesheets="@../../Styles/profile.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.smartfinance.Controller.Client.profileController">
   <children>
       <AnchorPane layoutX="10.0" layoutY="10.0" prefHeight="730.0" prefWidth="830.0" styleClass="inner_container" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="10.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="10.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="10.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="10.0">
           <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" styleClass="title" text="User Profile" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="20.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="20.0" />
           <Label layoutX="20.0" layoutY="75.0" text="View and manage your profile information." AnchorPane.leftAnchor="20.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="75.0" />

           <VBox layoutX="58.0" layoutY="140.0" prefHeight="154.0" prefWidth="300.0" spacing="15.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="58.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="120.0">
              <children>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
                          <Label prefWidth="120.0" text="First Name:" />
                          <Label fx:id="first_name_lbl" text="N/A" />
                      </children>
                  </HBox>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
                          <Label prefWidth="120.0" text="Last Name:" />
                          <Label fx:id="last_name_lbl" text="N/A" />
                      </children>
                  </HBox>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
                          <Label prefWidth="120.0" text="Payee Address:" />
                          <Label fx:id="payee_address_lbl" text="N/A" />
                      </children>
                  </HBox>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
                          <Label prefWidth="120.0" text="Registration Date:" />
                          <Label fx:id="reg_date_lbl" text="N/A" />
                      </children>
                  </HBox>
              </children>
           </VBox>

           <VBox layoutX="450.0" layoutY="160.0" prefHeight="154.0" prefWidth="300.0" spacing="15.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="70.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="120.0">
              <children>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
                          <Label prefWidth="150.0" text="Wallet Account Number:" />

                      </children>
                  </HBox>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
                          <Label prefWidth="150.0" text="Wallet Balance:" />

                      </children>
                  </HBox>
                  <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                      <children>
